module.short: offers various utilities to aid you debug a problem.

action.name: debug.show_connections
action.short: shows a page similar to the one from mod_status, listing all active connections
action.description: By specifying one or more "connection ids" via querystring (parameter "con"), one can request additional debug output for specific connections.

action.name: debug.profiler_dump
action.short: dumps all allocated memory to the profiler output file if profiling enabled

description.textile: lighttpd2 needs to be compiled with profiler support, and profiling has to be enabled by setting the environment variable @LIGHTY_PROFILE_MEM@ to the path of a target log file.

action.name: debug.show_events
action.short: shows a plain text list of all events
action.description: this is a very low level debug tool for developers.

setup.name: debug.show_events_after_shutdown
setup.short: time in seconds after start of shutdown to log remaining active events

parameter.name: timeout
parameter.short: timeout after which to display events (default: disabled)

parameter.name: repeat
parameter.short: timeout after which to repeat displaying events (default: disabled)

setup.description: this is a very low level debug tool for developers; it shows which event listeners keep lighttpd2 alive when it should stop.
